title: Lymphoid organ-targeted nanomaterials for immunomodulation of cancer, inflammation, and beyond
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,7657-7680
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00421C, Tutorial Review
Jessica C. Hsu, Peng Liu, Yangmeihui Song, Wenyu Song, Rachel J. Saladin, Ying Peng, Shuo Hu, Xiaoli Lan, Weibo Cai
Lymphoid organ-targeted nanomaterials with novel designs can modulate immune responses for the treatment of various diseases.
